## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) producing 42 iron ore per minute (currently inactive due to power loss)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) now empty after multiple rebuild attempts
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 74.0) with 20 coal fuel but no ingredients
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) disconnected from power network
- Current configuration shows persistent alignment issues (1.58 tile gap between chest and furnace)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - DEGRADED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational (100 water)
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) out of fuel (critical failure)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) disconnected with warnings:
  - No input liquid
  - Not connected to power network
- Pipe network intact but non-functional (water 15°C)

## ERROR TIPS

### Critical power system failures (NEW)
- Boiler completely out of fuel (3 failed refuel attempts)
- Steam engine disconnected from power network (2 occurrences)
- Electric mining drill inactive due to power loss (persistent)

### Furnace-chest alignment issues (persistent)
- 1.58 tile gap between chest (15.5,72.5) and furnace (16.0,74.0) prevents item transfer
- Verify adjacency requirements (maximum 1.0 tile gap allowed)

### Entity placement collisions (recurring)
- Failed inserter placement at (15.5,73.0) due to existing object (4 similar occurrences)
- Always scan target area before placement (5 missed verifications)

### Fuel management errors
- Attempted boiler refuel with empty coal inventory (2 occurrences)
- Maintain minimum coal reserves (recommended: 50 units)

### Production diagnostics
- Chest contents fluctuating (94 → 42 → 93 → 0) indicates unstable system
- Throughput monitoring shows complete production halt

### Configuration protocol
- Verify power connections after placement (3 missed checks)
- Test fuel insertion separately from production setup (not implemented)
- Confirm entity persistence after rebuilds (2 failed verifications)

### New Critical Issues
- Complete power grid collapse affecting all operations
- Mining drill blocked by full chest warning despite empty chest
- Boiler warnings not being addressed promptly
